translation.en: One, two, three!
♪ Take off ♪ ♪ Last stop ♪
♪ Countdown till we blast open the top ♪
♪ Face first ♪ ♪ Full charge ♪
♪ Electric hammer to the heart ♪
translation.es: como un martillo eléctrico al corazón.

translation.en: ♪ Clocks move faster ♪
♪ 'Cause it's all we're after now ♪
translation.es: porque es todo lo que buscamos.

translation.en: ♪ Won't stop climbing ♪
♪ 'Cause this is our time, yeah ♪
♪ When all the days felt black and white ♪
translation.es: Aquellos días en blanco y negro

translation.en: ♪ Those were the best shades of my life ♪
translation.es: fueron los mejores de mi vida.

translation.en: ♪ Don't look down ♪
♪ 'Cause we're still rising ♪ ♪ Up right now ♪
translation.es: porque seguimos subiendo más y más.

translation.en: ♪ And even if we hit the ground ♪
♪ We'll still fly ♪ ♪ Keep dreaming like we'll live forever ♪
translation.es: seguiremos volando y soñandocomo si viviéramos para siempre,

translation.en: ♪ But live it like it's now or never ♪
translation.es: pero viviendo como si fuera ahora o nunca.

translation.en: ♪ We ain't searching for tomorrow ♪
♪ Tomorrow ♪
♪ 'Cause we got all we need today ♪
translation.es: Porque tenemostodo lo que necesitamos hoy.

translation.en: ♪ Today ♪
♪ Living on a feeling ♪
♪ That's been running through our veins ♪
translation.es: que ha estado corriendopor nuestras venas.

translation.en: ♪ We're the revolution ♪
♪ That's been singing in the rain ♪
translation.es: que ha estado cantando bajo la lluvia.

translation.en: ♪ Don't look down ♪
♪ 'Cause we're still rising up right now ♪
translation.es: porque seguimos subiendo más y más.

translation.en: ♪ And even if we hit the ground ♪
♪ We'll still fly ♪ ♪ Keep dreaming like we'll live forever ♪
translation.es: seguiremos volando y soñandocomo si viviéramos para siempre,

translation.en: ♪ But live it like it's now or never ♪
translation.es: pero viviendo como si fuera ahora o nunca.

translation.en: ♪ It's now or never ♪
♪ Now or never ♪
-[girl 1] Whoo! Excellent! -[guy] Sounds great, guys!
-Yeah! -[band members laugh]
Thank you! We're Sunset Curve!
Too bad we wasted the tightest we've played on sound check!
translation.es: Lástima que era práctica. Estuvo genial.

translation.en: Wait until tonight, man, when this place gets packed with record execs.
translation.es: Espera a que se llenede ejecutivos discográficos.

translation.en: Alex, you were smoking.
Oh no. I was just warming up. You guys were the ones on fire.
Could you just own your awesomeness for once?
-All right, I was killing it. -[chuckles]
OK, well, I'm thinking we fuel up before the show. I'm thinking street dogs.
translation.es: ¿Nos recargarnos antes del showcon perros calientes?

translation.en: -Ooh! -Yes.
Hey, Bobby, where you going?
I'm good.
Vegetarian. I could never hurt an animal.
You guys are really good.
Thank you.
I see a lot of bands.
Been in a couple myself. I was really feeling it.
translation.es: También toco, y disfruté mucho su show.

translation.en: That's what we do this for. I'm Luke, by the way.
translation.es: Por eso tocamos. Soy Luke, por cierto.

translation.en: -Hi, I'm Reggie. -Alex.
Nice meeting you guys.
I'm Rose.
here's our demo.
And a T-shirt. Size beautiful.
Thanks.
I'll make sure not to wipe the tables down with this one.
translation.es: No la usaré para limpiar las mesas.

translation.en: Oh, good call. Whenever they get wet, they just kinda fall apart in your hands.
translation.es: Buena idea. Si se mojan, se te deshacen en las manos.

translation.en: Don't you guys have to go get hot dogs?
translation.es: ¿No tienen que ir por perros calientes?

translation.en: Yeah, he had a hamburger for lunch.
translation.es: Sí, comió una hamburguesapara el almuerzo.

translation.en: -That's what I'm talking about! -[Reggie chuckles]
The smell of Sunset Boulevard?
No. [chuckles]
It's what that girl said in there tonight.
translation.es: A lo que dijo esa chica.

translation.en: About our music, all right? It's like an energy.
translation.es: Nuestra música es como una energía.

translation.en: It connects us with people.
They can feel us when we play.
I want that connection with everybody.
translation.es: Quiero tener esa conexión con todos.

translation.en: Then we're gonna need more T-shirts.
Let's go, boys.
Ladies.
Reggie, wait! [girl 1 squeals]
-[girl 2] Oh my God. Reggie! -[girl 1] Oh my God! Hi, it's me!
Man... I can't wait until we eat someplace
translation.es: No puedo esperar a comer en lugares

translation.en: where the condiments aren't served out of the back of an Oldsmobile.
translation.es: que no sirvan comidaen la parte trasera de un auto.

translation.en: Hey... Sorry, I got some pickle juice on your battery cables.
translation.es: Disculpa, mojé los cables de la bateríacon jugo de pepinillo.

translation.en: No problem. It'll help with the rust.
-That can't... -[man chuckles]
OK. What?
This is awesome, you guys. We're playing The Orpheum!
translation.es: Esto es increíble, chicos.Vamos a tocar en el Orpheum.

translation.en: I can't even count how many bands have played here and then ended up being huge.
translation.es: Aquí tocaron innumerables bandasy terminaron siendo famosas.

translation.en: We're gonna be legends!
Eat up, boys.
'Cause after tonight,  everything changes.
translation.es: porque después de esta noche,todo cambiará.

translation.en: That's a new flavor.
Chill, man. Street dogs haven't killed us yet.
translation.es: Tranquilo. Aún no morimos por comer esto.

translation.en: Hey, underachiever.
Hey, disappointment.
OK, I know you don't want me to ask, but have you figured out
translation.es: Sé que no quieres recordarlo,pero ¿qué vas a hacer hoy?

translation.en: -what you're gonna do today? -I'll know in the moment.
translation.es: Sé que no quieres recordarlo,pero ¿qué vas a hacer hoy? Lo sabré en el momento.

translation.en: Really, Jules?
That's all you're giving me?
Mrs. Harrison said this is your last chance.
I know.
I was there.
-[sighs] -[girl] See you at the rally!
Ugh! What is she handing out?
-Hi! -Desperation?
Here you go. My group's performing at the spirit rally tomorrow.
translation.es: Tomen. Mi grupo se presentaráen la asamblea de motivación escolar.

translation.en: I'm sure you guys have nothing better to do.
translation.es: Seguro no tienen nada mejor que hacer.

translation.en: [sarcastically] Oh my gosh, Carrie. Thanks!
Oh my gosh, Flynn. Don't bother coming!
translation.es: ¡Cielos, Flynn, no te molestes en venir!

translation.en: Here you go.
[Carrie] Come see Dirty Candy tomorrow.
translation.es: Vayan a ver a Dirty Candy.

translation.en: Nick?
[Flynn] Still?
You know they're gonna get married and have a bunch of unholy babies.
translation.es: Sabes que esos dos se casarány tendrán bebés malignos.

translation.en: Nick's a sweetheart.
You'd actually have to talk to him to know that.
And only one of them has to be a demon to make a demon baby.
translation.es: Y solo hace falta un demoniopara que el bebé sea maligno.

translation.en: Demon!
There's that smile. Now, let's go prove everybody wrong.
translation.es: Ahí está esa sonrisa.Ahora mostrémosles que se equivocan.

translation.en: Nice job, Nick.
Almost as impressive as your game against Glendale.
translation.es: Casi tantocomo el partido contra Glendale.

translation.en: OK, we have one last performance.
[claps] Julie?
Take your time.
I'm sorry.
Is this when we clap?
Watch it, Carrie.
Oh good. You're home.
I was about to go watch your brother's game.
translation.es: Voy a ir al partido de tu hermano.

translation.en: I've had photo shoots all day. Didn't even get a chance to eat.
translation.es: Estuve sacando fotos todo el día,ni siquiera almorcé.

translation.en: But... I got a phone call today.
Yeah, I figured as much.
Yeah.
translation.es: Sí, de mi amiga agente inmobiliaria.

translation.en: -Well, it was my Realtor friend. -Oh, that.
translation.es: Sí, de mi amiga agente inmobiliaria. Ah, era sobre eso.

translation.en: Yeah, and she says if we are serious about selling the house,
translation.es: Sí, y dijo que si en verdadqueremos vender la casa,

translation.en: then she wants me to take some pictures for the website.
translation.es: necesitará algunas fotospara el sitio web.

translation.en: Which means we have to do a lot of cleaning and get rid of some stuff.
translation.es: Así que debemos ordenar bieny botar algunas cosas.

translation.en: And maybe you can... tackle Mom's studio?
You're the expert.
You know, your brother and I wouldn't even know where to begin.
translation.es: Con tu hermano,no sabríamos por dónde empezar.

translation.en: It's OK, honey. If you're not ready, I--
translation.es: Está bien, si no estás lista…

translation.en: No. It's all right.
Maybe I'll try tonight.
Yeah? [claps]
Awesome, mija. Thank you.
Oh, and don't forget the loft. You know, those old instruments that were there when we moved in?
translation.es: Y no olvides los instrumentosque estaban aquí cuando nos mudamos.

translation.en: They need a new home.
Mom would like that.
[dad] Yeah, she would.
Oh God. I'm gonna be late.
Under the mail.
[snaps fingers] You're a lifesaver.
I'm so sorry, Mom.
That I haven't been here.
How did we get back here?
-Dad! -[dad] Whoa! Hey!
Whoa! Slow down. You look like you've seen a ghost.
translation.es: Despacio. Parece que viste un fantasma.

translation.en: -I have! -Cool.
Not cool! [grunts]
Run! [grunts]
[sighs] Come on, Flynn.  911 means 911!
Why aren't you answering me? [exhales sharply]
-[dad] Hey. -[Julie screams]
-[Julie] Dad. -Sorry.
Just wanted to make sure you were OK.
translation.es: Solo quería ver si estabas bien.

translation.en: You don't believe me, do you?
Honey, of course I do. Mija, I see your mom all the time.
translation.es: Claro que sí. Mija, veo a tu mamá todo el tiempo.

translation.en: This isn't like that.
I know. It's different for all of us.
translation.es: Lo sé. Es diferente para todos.

translation.en: Dad, you're not listening to me.
I saw something out there.
All right. OK. OK.
I'm listening.
Tell me what you saw. It's just you and me here.
translation.es: Dime lo que viste. Estamos solos.

translation.en: [sighs] You sound just like Dr. Turner.
Well, maybe seeing Dr. Turner again isn't such a bad idea.
translation.es: Bueno, quizá no sea mala ideair a visitarlo.

translation.en: Dad!
Can we just drop it?
All right.
Dropped.
[dad] We good?
Yeah.
Are you still here...
[exhales shakily] ...whatever you are?
I know I saw something. I'm not crazy.
translation.es: Sé que vi algo. No estoy loca.

translation.en: Well, we're all a little crazy.
Oh my God! Please stop screaming!
Who are you, and what are you doing in my mom's studio?
translation.es: ¿Qué hacen en el estudio de mi mamá?

translation.en: Your mom's studio? This is our studio. Trust me, my...
translation.es: ¿El estudio de tu mamá?Este es nuestro estudio. Créeme, el piano de cola es nuevo y…

translation.en: The grand piano is new, and... and... and ...
translation.es: Créeme, el piano de cola es nuevo y…

translation.en: [giggling] My couch!
That is definitely not my six-string.
translation.es: Esa definitivamente no es mi guitarra.

translation.en: Can you give me just one second?
Just... give me a second. Thank you.
Guys, what is going on? How did she get her stuff in here so fast?
translation.es: Chicos, ¿qué está pasando?¿Cómo trajo sus cosas aquí tan rápido?

translation.en: Maybe... maybe she's a witch. There's chairs floating on the ceiling.
translation.es: Quizá sea una bruja.Hay sillas flotando en el techo.

translation.en: OK, there is no such thing as witches.
You sure? I used to think there was no such thing as ghosts.
That's fair.
OK, so we're going with witch?
No! We are not going with witch.
She's not a witch. OK, look. She's just scared.
OK? Let someone with a softer touch handle this.
translation.es: Dejen que alguien con más tactose encargue de esto.

translation.en: Why are you in our studio?
Oh my gosh! How did you do that?
Clearly, you're not understanding... She doesn't get it.
OK, look. We're ghosts, all right?
We're just three ghosts, and we're really happy to be home.
translation.es: Somos tres fantasmasfelices de estar en casa.

translation.en: So, thank you for the flowers. They really brighten up the room.
translation.es: Gracias por las flores.Le dan un bonito toque al lugar.

translation.en: -We're in a band called Sunset Curve. -Tell your friends.
translation.es: - Somos Sunset Curve.- Haz correr la voz.

translation.en: Last night was supposed to be a really big night for us. It was gonna change our lives.
translation.es: Se supone que nuestras vidasiban a cambiar anoche.

translation.en: I'm, uh... I'm pretty sure it did.
This is freaking me out. [breathes sharply, grunts]
-What is that? What are you doing? -It's my phone.
translation.es: - ¿Qué es eso? ¿Qué haces?- Es mi teléfono.

translation.en: No! Stop talking to them. They aren't real.
translation.es: Deja de hablarles, no son reales.Los fantasmas lindos no existen.

translation.en: -There's no such thing as cute ghosts. -Oh, think we're cute?
translation.es: Deja de hablarles, no son reales.Los fantasmas lindos no existen. Vaya, ¿somos lindos?

translation.en: -[Julie taps keys] -Who you calling? I'm Googling Sunset Swerve.
translation.es: - ¿A quién llamas?- Busco "Sunset Swerve" en Google.

translation.en: [all] Sunset Curve!
[Julie] Whoa.
There is a Sunset Curve.
You did die.
But not last night.
Twenty-five years ago?
What? No. No, no, no. Th-Th-That's impossible. After we floated out of the ambulance,
translation.es: ¿Qué? No, eso es imposible.Luego de flotar de la ambulancia,

translation.en: all we did was go to that weird, dark room where Alex cried.
translation.es: solo fuimos al cuarto oscurodonde Alex lloró.

translation.en: [high-pitched] Well... I don't think...
I think we were all pretty upset. OK.
But that was just for like an hour.
translation.es: Pero eso duró como una hora.

translation.en: We just showed up here.
Look. I'm just telling you what my phone says.
translation.es: Solo estoy leyendolo que dice mi teléfono.

translation.en: See? You died in 1995.
When you were 17.
It's now 2020.
So, this is the future?
Wait. So... So, it has been 25 years.
I have been crying for 25 years? How is that possible?
translation.es: ¿Estuve llorando por 25 años? - ¿Cómo es posible?- Eres muy sensible.

translation.en: -Well, you're a very emotional person. -I am not!
translation.es: - ¿Cómo es posible?- Eres muy sensible. ¡No lo soy!

translation.en: [boy] Thought you were afraid to come out here.
You talking to your ghost friend? How does he look? Is he hideous?
-He can see you. -No, he can't.
What?
Uh... What do you want?
A normal sister, for starters. Stop being weird and come eat.
translation.es: Una hermana normal, para empezar.Deja de ser rara y ven a comer.

translation.en: He couldn't see you.
Yeah. I mean, that's... -usually how ghosts work. -[Reggie] Hmm.
translation.es: Sí, bueno, así funcionanlos fantasmas por lo general.

translation.en: Look, I'm very sorry for what happened to you guys,
translation.es: Miren, lamento mucho lo que les pasó,

translation.en: but this isn't your studio anymore.
translation.es: pero este ya no es su estudio.

translation.en: You have to leave.
But wait. We...
-We didn't get your name. -It's Julie.
Cool. [chuckles] I-I'm Luke,
by... by the way.
-And this is-- -Reggie. I'm Reggie.
-Hey. -[Luke] And...
Alex. How's it going?
OK?
Julie seems nice.
Did you miss the part where she kicked us out, or...
translation.es: ¿No escuchaste que nos acaba de echar?

translation.en: Yes. OK.
There we go!
OK.
-Let's do this. -Let's do it.
Your turn, Carlos.
Thank you for our leftovers and the power of the mighty microwave.
translation.es: Gracias por las sobrasy el poder del gran microondas.

translation.en: -Amen. -Amen.
So...
Carlos tells me he found you in the studio.
translation.es: Carlos me dijoque te encontró en el estudio.

translation.en: She was out there talking to herself.
I was rehearsing for a play.
[woman] Hello, hello!
Oh, busted!
Yeah, we're in here. Quick!
Spaghetti. Again?
Yeah.
That's too bad.
I brought you my pasteles and arroz con pollo.
translation.es: Les traje mis pasteles y arroz con pollo.

translation.en: -Yum. -[Julie] Mm!
Thanks, tia. It smells great.
You can have it tomorrow.
I can't let you have leftovers every night.
translation.es: No puedo dejarlos comer sobrastodas las noches.

translation.en: My sister would kill me, may she rest in peace.
translation.es: Mi hermana me mataría,que en paz descanse.

translation.en: Oh... I see things here are going better?
translation.es: Veo que las cosas están mejorando.

translation.en: Actually...
...Julie has been cleaning out mom's studio.
translation.es: Julie ha estado limpiandoel estudio de mamá.

translation.en: Hopefully, we can get the house on the market and some offers soon.
translation.es: Con suerte, podremos ponerla casa en venta pronto.

translation.en: Well, I like the sound of that.
Moving from here is only gonna help you move on.
translation.es: Mudarse los ayudará a seguir adelante.

translation.en: You've got to rip that Band-Aid off and get the pain over with.
translation.es: Deben sacarse la curitay acabar con el dolor.

translation.en: [chuckles awkwardly] That's me. Ripping off the Band-Aid.
translation.es: Esa soy yo, sacándome la curita.

translation.en: There's my brave girl.
Hey, Julie, I really like what you guys did with the place.
-You shouldn't be here. -[aunt gasps]
Oh, I'm just here to help, mija.
Oh... I think that's our cue to leave.
I mean, you should be at Pilates.
translation.es: Es decir, deberías estar en pilates.

translation.en: -Thanks for bringing us food. -Oh. [chuckles]
-We should've called first. -[aunt] It's nothing.
translation.es: - Debimos haber pedido permiso.- De nada.

translation.en: And now that you're no longer in the music program,
translation.es: Y ahora que no estásen el programa de música,

translation.en: you can concentrate on classes that matter.
You got the e-mail from the school, right?
Yeah.
We're still discussing it.
Bueno. I'm off to Pilates.
-Mwah! -Oh yeah!
Wa-chow! It's gone.
So, Julie,
wanna hear how I slid into home and was almost safe?
translation.es: ¿te cuento cómo hoy corríy casi anoté una carrera?

translation.en: You're a good brother. That's not gonna work.
I tried.
Why didn't you tell me? You made me lie to your aunt.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me contaste?Tuve que mentirle a tu tía.

translation.en: Sorry. I was gonna tell you after dinner.
translation.es: Lo siento.Te iba a contar después de cenar.

translation.en: -Yeah. Mm-hmm. -I was.
Honey, I know those classes can be difficult,
translation.es: Cariño, sé que esas clasespueden ser difíciles.

translation.en: but you still like music, don't you?
I don't know. Maybe.
Look, we talked about this, you know? And how painful memories can be, but...
translation.es: Ya hablamos de que los recuerdospueden ser muy dolorosos, pero…

translation.en: You know, every time I see you and Carlos, I see Mom.
translation.es: Cada vez que los veo, veo a su mamá.

translation.en: It's like she's right here with us.
translation.es: Es como si estuviera con nosotros.

translation.en: But you know what? I love that. I do.
translation.es: ¿Y sabes qué? Me encanta. En serio.

translation.en: And maybe if you'd give yourself a chance,
translation.es: Y quizá si te das una oportunidad,

translation.en: you'll get there.
What's that?
I must have left the stereo on in the garage.
I'll go get it.
[yells] Guys! Guys, stop!
Enough! Stop! Cut it out!
The whole neighborhood could hear you. I thought I told you to leave.
translation.es: Todos pueden escucharlos.Les dije que se fueran.

translation.en: Wait. People can hear us play?
Yes! And so did my dad and my brother!
translation.es: ¡Sí! ¡Mi papá y mi hermano los escucharon!

translation.en: W-W-Wait. Wait.
So, only you can see us,
but everyone can hear us?
-I mean, what kind of ghosts are we? -Who cares, man? People can hear us play!
translation.es: - ¿Qué clase de fantasmas somos?- ¿Qué importa? ¡Pueden oírnos tocar!

translation.en: We might be dead, but our music isn't.
translation.es: Nuestra música aún no ha muerto.

translation.en: Dad!
Hey.
Just making sure you're OK.
Yeah, I'm fine. I just had to turn off the CD player.
translation.es: Sí, estoy bien. Solo apagué el estéreo.

translation.en: Wait. Is this the junk that was in the loft?
translation.es: ¿Es la basura que estaba en el desván?

translation.en: Junk?
Some of this stuff's in pretty good shape.
Hey, maybe we can make a couple bucks.
What? Yo, stop touching my drums. Tell him to stop touching my drums.
translation.es: ¿Qué? Dile que deje de tocar mi batería.

translation.en: I liked that song you had on.
-Sweet! We're Sunset Curve. -Tell your friends.
translation.es: - Genial. Somos Sunset Curve.- Haz correr la voz.

translation.en: It's just an old CD I found.
translation.es: Es de un viejo CD que encontré.

translation.en: Well, still, it's nice that you're listening to music again.
translation.es: Como sea, es buenoque vuelvas a escuchar música.

translation.en: Out here you can play whatever you want, whenever you want.
That's nice!
Stay out of this.
I-I'm sorry, honey. I didn't...
Oh no, no, no, no. Not you. I mean... Uh... Er...
translation.es: No te decía a ti. Es decir…

translation.en: You know, give me a minute.
Hey. Hey. Hey. Hey. We'll figure out this music program thing.
translation.es: Escucha, ya resolveremoslo del programa de música.

translation.en: Thanks, Dad.
-He likes our song. -Oh yeah. He doesn't count.
translation.es: - Le gustó la canción.- Sí, pero no cuenta.

translation.en: He's a dad.
Why can't you guys just be normal ghosts?
Hang out at an old mansion. I hear Pasadena's nice.
translation.es: Vayan a una mansión vieja.Oí que Pasadena es agradable.

translation.en: I think she's warming up to us.
Yeah, I've always wanted to go to Pasadena.
Stop that. I'm serious.
Oh, I'm sorry.
What do you want?
I know this is all completely insane, but you do know how rad this is?
translation.es: Sé que es una locura,pero esto es muy buena onda.

translation.en: People... Actual people can hear us play.
Yeah, it's just I've just had a really, really awful day.
translation.es: Sí, pero hoy tuve un muy mal día.Debo irme.

translation.en: -I gotta go. -Well, I'm sorry you had a bad day,
translation.es: Sí, pero hoy tuve un muy mal día.Debo irme. Lamento escuchar eso,

translation.en: but three guys just found out that they had a bad 25 years,
translation.es: pero acabamos de descubrirque tuvimos 25 años malos,

translation.en: and then they found out that the one thing they lived for in the first place they can still do.
translation.es: y que aún podemos hacerlo que más nos importó en la vida.

translation.en: That's pretty rad.
You're right.
-It's just... -Your bad day.
Yeah. I know.
Look, I'm sorry we came into your life,
but...
what I just felt in there actually made me feel alive again.
translation.es: lo que sentí ahíme hizo sentirme vivo otra vez.

translation.en: We all felt alive again.
translation.es: Todos nos sentimos vivos otra vez.

translation.en: So, you can kick us out if you want, but we're not giving up music.
translation.es: Así que puedes echarnos,pero no renunciaremos a la música.

translation.en: We can play again. That's a gift no musician would ever turn down.
translation.es: Podemos volver a tocar.Es un regalo que ningún músico rechazaría.

translation.en: You gotta know that.
Clearly, your mom is into music.
translation.es: A tu mamá le gusta la música.

translation.en: Was.
She passed away.
I am...  so sorry.
[Alex] Yeah, we... we didn't know.
It's all right.
You guys haven't seen her anywhere, have you?
From wherever you're from.
No. No, I mean, you're kind of the first person we've seen.
translation.es: No, eres la primera persona que vemos.

translation.en: Yeah, but she's not dead, so it doesn't answer her question.
translation.es: Pero ella no está muerta. Eso no ayuda.

translation.en: Yeah. I think she knows what we mean.
I'm sorry for your loss.
Thanks.
Sorry I got mad.
You guys are kinda good.
Kinda?
Y-Y-You know that's like 25 years of rust just getting dusted off.
translation.es: Nos falta práctica.No habíamos tocado en 25 años.

translation.en: -Yeah. Do you play the piano too? -[Julie] No.
No, I don't play. That was my mom's stuff in there.
translation.es: No, esas eran las cosas de mi mamá.

translation.en: No way. She's an amazing songwriter.
She was.
Wait. How would you know?
There's a song on the piano. If it's hers...
translation.es: Hay una canción en el piano.Si es de ella…

translation.en: Your mom was really talented.
I guess...  if you need a place to stay,
translation.es: Supongo… que si necesitanun lugar donde quedarse,

translation.en: you can stay in there.
There's a bathroom in the back
and a couch that turns into a bed if you still use any of that stuff.
translation.es: y un sofá cama,por si siguen usando esas cosas.

translation.en: Dibs on the shower!
I just really like showers and sometimes the occasional bath.
translation.es: Me gustan las duchas y los baños de tina.

translation.en: This...
This is just too weird.
Yeah.
[Julie] "What would you say if I told you
there are three ghosts living in my mom's studio?"
translation.es: que hay tres fantasmasviviendo en el estudio de mi mamá?

translation.en: You'd say I'm crazy.
Hey, I know being dead isn't our first choice,
translation.es: Sé que morir no es nuestra primera opción,

translation.en: but, I mean, it sure is easy getting around.
translation.es: pero sí que es fácil moverse.

translation.en: Easy for you, maybe.
I lost my shirt on that one.
Ooh, never mind! There it is.
OK, so,  why'd you bring us here?
translation.es: Bien, ¿y por qué nos trajiste aquí?

translation.en: Just another painful reminder of where we never got to play.
translation.es: ¿Solo para ver el lugardonde nunca pudimos tocar?

translation.en: -Thanks, Luke. -I mean, boys, the game isn't over yet.
translation.es: Gracias, Luke. Chicos, el juego aún no ha terminado.

translation.en: I'm telling you, we've been given a second chance.
translation.es: En serio, tenemos una segunda oportunidad.

translation.en: Let's find some music.
Let's see how many clubs we can hit before sunrise.
translation.es: ¿A cuántos clubes podremos irantes del amanecer?

translation.en: Hey!
[Luke] Hey, Alex. You coming?
Let's go!
Guys?
Guys?
♪ Here's one thing ♪
♪ I want you to know ♪
♪ You got someplace to go ♪
♪ Life's a test, yes But you go toe-to-toe ♪
translation.es: La vida es una prueba, sí,pero tú le haces frente.

translation.en: ♪ You don't give up, no You grow ♪
translation.es: Nunca te rindes, no. Tú creces.

translation.en: ♪ And you use your pain ♪
♪ 'Cause it makes you you ♪
translation.es: porque te convierte en quien eres,

translation.en: ♪ Though I wish I could hold you through it ♪
♪ I know it's not the same ♪
translation.es: Sé que no es lo mismo,

translation.en: ♪ You got living to do ♪
♪ And I just want you to do it ♪
translation.es: y yo solo quiero que lo hagas.

translation.en: ♪ So get up, get out Relight that spark ♪
translation.es: Así que levántate,sal y vuelve a encender esa chispa.

translation.en: ♪ You know the rest by heart ♪
translation.es: Te sabes el resto de memoria.

translation.en: ♪ Wake up, wake up If it's all you do ♪
translation.es: Despierta, aunque sealo único que puedas hacer.

translation.en: ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.es: Mira hacia afuera y hacia tu interior.

translation.en: ♪ It's not what you lost ♪
translation.es: No se trata de lo que perdiste,

translation.en: ♪ It's what you'll gain Raising your voice to the rain ♪
translation.es: sino de lo que ganarásal gritarle a la lluvia.

translation.en: ♪ Wake up your dream and make it true ♪
translation.es: Despierta tu sueño y hazlo realidad.

translation.en: [Julie continues singing] ♪ Look out, look inside of you ♪
translation.es: Mira hacia afuera y hacia tu interior.

translation.en: ♪ It's not what you lost ♪
translation.es: No se trata de lo que perdiste.

translation.en: ♪ Relight that spark Time to come out of the dark ♪
translation.es: Vuelve a encender esa chispa.Es hora de salir de la oscuridad.

translation.es: pero no dejaré que me confunda

translation.es: y dejaré que mis dedos vuelen.
